custom_nodes.author: #NOTICE_1.13
custom_nodes.title: NOTICE: This channel is not the default channel.
custom_nodes.description:
If you see this message, your ComfyUI-Manager is outdated.
Recent channel provides only the list of the latest nodes. If you want to find the complete node list, please go to the Default channel.
Making LoRA has never been easier!

custom_nodes.author: blackcodetavern
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Benripack
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI-Benripack is an extension for ComfyUI that provides a CharacterPipe node. This node allows for managing various elements such as images, prompts, and models in a single structure, simplifying the workflow for character-based image generation.

custom_nodes.author: Cyber-Blacat
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Yuan
custom_nodes.description: Some simple&practical ComfyUI image processing nodes.

custom_nodes.author: NeuralSamurAI
custom_nodes.title: FluxPseudoNegative
custom_nodes.description: FluxPseudoNegative is an advanced custom node for ComfyUI that converts negative prompts into positive ones. It's designed to enhance prompt engineering for image generation models that don't natively support negative prompts or where using negative prompts significantly increases generation time. So instead of hacking CFG we simply invert your negative words and find their antonyms!

custom_nodes.author: LING-APE

custom_nodes.author: NeuralSamurAI
custom_nodes.title: PromptJSON Node for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: PromptJSON is a custom node for ComfyUI that structures natural language prompts and generates prompts for external LLM nodes in image generation workflows. It aids in creating consistent, schema-based image descriptions.

custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_M3Net

custom_nodes.description: This extension integrates Google's Gemini API and Ollama into ComfyUI, allowing users to leverage these powerful language models directly within their ComfyUI workflows.

custom_nodes.description: Node:Prompt Worker. A text manipulation node for postprocessing of prompt.

custom_nodes.description: a comfyui custom node for [a/DH_live](https://github.com/kleinlee/DH_live)

custom_nodes.author: NeuralSamurAI
custom_nodes.title: Dimensional Latent Perlin for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: Dimensional Latent Perlin is a custom node for ComfyUI that generates Perlin noise in the latent space. This node is designed to work seamlessly with various diffusion models and can be used as an alternative or complement to standard random noise generators in image generation pipelines.

custom_nodes.author: Dobidop
custom_nodes.title: Dobidop ComfyStereo
custom_nodes.description: Two simple nodes for stereoscopic image generation. Nodes: Stereo Image Node - a basic port from the Automatic1111 stereo script in thygate/stable-diffusion-webui-depthmap-script, LazyStereo - a na√Øve stereo image generator

custom_nodes.author: caleboleary
custom_nodes.title: Arc2Face ComfyUI Node Library
custom_nodes.description: This ComfyUI node library builds upon the work done to train the [a/Arc2Face](https://github.com/foivospar/Arc2Face) model by foivospar. It provides a set of nodes for ComfyUI that allow users to extract face embeddings, generate images based on these embeddings, and perform image-to-image transformations.

custom_nodes.author: NMWave
custom_nodes.title: Image Captioning and Tagging Assistor Nodes
custom_nodes.description: A small set of useful nodes which aid with the tagging process by splitting tags and strings, alternating tags from multiple sources and removing duplicates.

custom_nodes.author: alpertunga-bile
custom_nodes.title: image-caption-comfyui
custom_nodes.description: Image caption node for ComfyUI. You can load your image caption model and generate prompts with the given picture. Insert prompt node is added here to help the users to add their prompts easily.

custom_nodes.author: GeekyGhost
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-GeekyRemB
custom_nodes.description: GeekyRemB is a powerful and versatile image processing node for ComfyUI, designed to remove backgrounds from images with advanced customization options. This node leverages the rembg library and offers a wide range of features for fine-tuning the background removal process and enhancing the resulting images.

custom_nodes.author: AIFSH
custom_nodes.title: AniTalker-ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: a comfyui custom node for [a/AniTalker](https://github.com/X-LANCE/AniTalker)

custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_FoxTools
custom_nodes.description: Nodes:BatchImageFromList, Load Face Occlusion Model, Create Face Mask, Simple FaceAlign, Cacul FaceAlign, Gen Blurbord, Face Align, Face Rotate, ImageAdd, LoadImageList, SaveImage Plus, RegTextFind

custom_nodes.author: Anibaaal
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI UX Nodes
custom_nodes.description: Nodes: Easy Resolution Picker, Step Calculator

custom_nodes.author: aonekoss
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Counter
custom_nodes.description: A simple counter, when pressing 'Queue Prompt' resets the count.

custom_nodes.author: da2el-ai
custom_nodes.title: D2 Send Eagle
custom_nodes.description: This is a custom node for sending images generated in ComfyUI to the image management software Eagle. It's an extension of an existing custom node called [a/ComfyUI-send-eagle-slim](https://github.com/shingo1228/ComfyUI-send-eagle-slim), modified to suit my preferences. I'm grateful to Shingo.T for creating the excellent original custom node.

custom_nodes.author: Extraltodeus
custom_nodes.title: Skimmed_CFG
custom_nodes.description: A powerful anti-burn allowing much higher CFG scales for latent diffusion models (for ComfyUI)

custom_nodes.author: noarche
custom_nodes.title: Color Enhance
custom_nodes.description:
Script for [a/AUTOMATIC1111/stable-diffusion-webui](https://github.com/AUTOMATIC1111/stable-diffusion-webui) and node for ComfyUI to enhance colors.
This is the same algorithm GIMP/GEGL uses for color enhancement. The gist of this implementation is that it converts the color space to [CIELCh(ab) and normalizes the chroma (or '[a/colorfulness](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Colorfulness)') component. Original source can be found in the link below.

custom_nodes.author: PowerHouseMan
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-AdvancedLivePortrait
custom_nodes.description: AdvancedLivePortrait with Facial expression editor

custom_nodes.author: cdxOo
custom_nodes.title: Text Node With Comments (@cdxoo)
custom_nodes.description: multiline text node that strips c-style comments (i.e.'//' and '/* ... */') before passing output string downstream

custom_nodes.author: 11dogzi
custom_nodes.title: Comfyui-ergouzi-kaiguan
custom_nodes.description: Group switching control, one click control to ignore and disable multiple groups, as well as wired switch combination nodes, allowing for arbitrary switching of annotation names

custom_nodes.author: neverbiasu
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI SAM2(Segment Anything 2)
custom_nodes.description: This project adapts the SAM2 to incorporate functionalities from [a/comfyui_segment_anything](https://github.com/storyicon/comfyui_segment_anything). Many thanks to continue-revolution for their foundational work.

custom_nodes.author: kijai
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-segment-anything-2
custom_nodes.description: Nodes to use [a/segment-anything-2](https://github.com/facebookresearch/segment-anything-2) for image or video segmentation.

custom_nodes.author: akatz-ai
custom_nodes.title: Akatz Custom Nodes
custom_nodes.description: Simple custom node pack for nodes I use in my workflows. Includes Dilate Mask Linear for animating masks.

custom_nodes.author: MiddleKD
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-mem-safe-wrapper
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI's Smart Memory Management efficiently manages RAM, GPU memory, and garbage collection. This feature keeps frequently used models in memory to increase inference speed, and dynamically releases less important models when memory is low to optimize resources. However, not all ComfyUI custom node developers create nodes that are compatible with Smart memory management. This includes several impressive models. Mem-safe-wrapper is a custom node that wraps these model nodes to enable ComfyUI's Smart memory management capabilities.

custom_nodes.author: teward
custom_nodes.title: Comfy-Sentry
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI custom node that activates integration with a Sentry instance for loading. Has no actual nodes.
